Articles.Content:
Equipment from the war. How very fitting for use in the birth of a rocket. It might very well have been involved in the construction of the first ballistic rockets.

See how large pieces of equipment can get me all emotional

Equipment from the war. How very fitting for use in the birth of a rocket. It might very well have been involved in the construction of the first ballistic rockets.

See how large pieces of equipment can get me all emotional

Yeah it kinda is, since our TM-65 engine and our use of jetvanes, relies very much on Von Brauns work on the V-2
Now you just need to learn how to use safety goggles and keep the slides free of tools...
